```{r}
library(ggplot2)
beaver1
```

#單變數：類別型

```{r}
ggplot(data = beaver1,aes(x=temp))+
geom_bar(fill = "lightblue", colour = "black")
```

#單變數：連續型
```{r}
ggplot(data=beaver1,aes(x=temp))+
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5)
```

#雙變數：連續 vs 連續

```{r}
ggplot(data=beaver1,aes(x=day, y=temp))+
  geom_point()
```

#雙變數：離散 vs 連續

```{r}
ggplot(data=beaver1, aes(x=time, y=temp)) +
geom_boxplot()
```

#多變量：水獺體溫與活動量的關係

```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("scales")
library("GGally")
library("memisc")

set.seed(20022012)
beaver_samp <- beaver1[sample(1:length(beaver1$temp), 100), ]
ggpairs(beaver_samp,lower= list(continuous = wrap("points", shape = I('.'))),
        upper = list(combo = wrap("box", outlier.shape = I('.'))))
